SALEvent.Description: Indicates when all of the M2 axes are within tolerance of the target positions.

item.Description: True if the M2 assembly is in position.

SALEvent.Description: Indicates if the measured cell temperature is more than the specified value above the conditioned supply air temperature.

item.Description: True if the cell temperature is high.

SALEvent.Description: New detailed state on each summary state transition.

item.Description: M2 detailed state.

SALEvent.Description: High level state machine state identifier of controller. It is the same as CSC summary state at this moment.

item.Description: M2 controller state.

SALEvent.Description: Can the commandable SAL component (CSC) control the MTM2?

item.Description: If true the CSC can control the MTM2; else the Engineering User Interface has control.

SALEvent.Description: MTM2 interlock: This event is generated when safety interlock is engaged or disengaged

item.Description: True if the interlock is engaged. False if it is cleared.

SALEvent.Description: State of TCP/IP connection between the server and the low level controller.

item.Description: Is the socket connected (true=yes, false=no)?

SALEvent.Description: Hardpoint list in the low-level controller.

item.Description: Actuator Ids to be the hardpoint.

SALEvent.Description: The status of force balance (FB) system (on or off).

item.Description: True if FB is on, False if off.

SALEvent.Description: The source of inclination telemetry (onboard or from main telescope mount (MTMount) control system).

item.Description: 1: onboard. 2: MTMount.

SALEvent.Description: Offset of temperature sensors.

item.Description: Offset of ring temperatures: LG2-1, LG2-2, LG2-3, LG2-4, LG3-1, LG3-2, LG3-3, LG3-4, LG4-1, LG4-2, LG4-3, and LG4-4.
Offset of intake temperatures: #1 and #2.
Offset of exhaust temperatures: #1 and #2.

SALEvent.Description: Execution status of the binary script performed by engineering user interface (EUI).

item.Description: Percentage of the execution status (0% - 100%).

SALEvent.Description: Digital output as a 8-bit value. See the enum.py in ts_m2com for the details.

item.Description: Digital output.

SALEvent.Description: Processed digital input as a 32-bit value. The power-breaker related values will be adjusted based on the comparision between the measured voltage and nominal voltage to see the reading input is real or not. See the enum.py in ts_m2com for the details.

item.Description: Digital input.

SALEvent.Description: System configuration.

item.Description: Configuration file name.
Configuration version.
Directory name of the control parameters.
Directory name of the look-up table (LUT) parameters.
Percentage of the 24V actuator motor power accuracy warning (0% - 100%).
Percentage of the 24V actuator motor power accuracy fault (0% - 100%).
Power threshold of the actuator motor.
Percentage of the 24V inner-loop controller (ILC) communication power accuracy warning (0% - 100%).
Percentage of the 24V ILC communication power accuracy fault (0% - 100%).
Power threshold of the ILC communication.
Threshold to judge the axial actuator is in position or not.
Threshold to judge the tangent actuator is in position or not.
Sampling window size of in-position flag.
Temperature delta between the cell intake and exhaust temperature sensors to judge the mirror's temperature is high or not.

SALEvent.Description: Open-loop maximum force limit is enabled or not.

item.Description: Status of the open-loop maximum force limit. True if it is enabled. Otherwise, False.

SALEvent.Description: Triggered retract limit switch.

item.Description: 0-based actuator ID.

SALEvent.Description: Triggered extend limit switch.

item.Description: 0-based actuator ID.

SALEvent.Description: Power system status.

item.Description: 1: Actuator motor. 2: Inner-loop controller (ILC) communication.
Power status is on or not.
1: Initialization. 2: Powered off. 3: Powering on. 4: Resetting breakers. 5: Powered on. 6: Powering off.

SALEvent.Description: Closed-loop control mode.

item.Description: 1: Idle. 2: Telemetry only. 3: Open-loop. 4: Closed-loop.

SALEvent.Description: Inner-loop control mode.

item.Description: 0-based inner-loop controller (ILC) address.
1: Standby. 2: Disabled. 3: Enabled. 4: Updating firmware. 5: Fault. 6: Clearing faults. 7: No change. 8: Unknown.

SALEvent.Description: Summary faults status of the controller as a 64-bit value.

item.Description: Summary faults status. Each bit means different error/warning. See the error_code.tsv in ts_config_mttcs/MTM2 for the details.

SALEvent.Description: Enabled faults mask of the controller as a 64-bit value.

item.Description: Enabled faults mask. Each bit means different error/warning. See the error_code.tsv in ts_config_mttcs/MTM2 for the details.

SALEvent.Description: Available configuration files in the controller.

item.Description: Available configuration files.
